name: ChristianMeditation(Affirmations)-HumanVoice
0:
”Alexa, open voice bible affirmations”
”Alexa, tell me who I am from voice bible affirmations”
”Alexa, what does jesus say about me from voice bible affirmations”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: voice bible affirmations
des:
Human Voice Edition! By popular demand, we have released a human voice version of our Who I Am In Christ (Biblical Affirmations) Alexa skill. 

Enable this skill to hear what the Bible says about Christians. Ask Alexa, open voice voice bible affirmations and "who am I", "tell me truth", "what does the bible say", or "what does Jesus say".

This Christian Mediation (Who I Am) skill is short and simple on purpose. When you open it, one affirmation from scripture will be spoken several times. This is intended to offer quick reminders as you scurry about your day and home.

In our modern world, everyone and everything tries to define you and tell you what and who you are or are not. This simple skill helps Christians focus on what the Bible and Jesus Christ say about who they are as they seek to love, worship, and obey Jesus.

Important: We are considering offering this as a paid skill for $1.99/mo. This would allow us to invest more time in growing the the skills and library. However, we wanted to offer this for free to start. If you would be will to pay for this, let us know at https://christianmeditation.co/contact.

Also, check out the version 1 release of our Christian Meditation Alexa skill here: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B076DM2F5G. This is a longer-form meditation skill that reads a selection of scripture and offers a few prompts for how to process, apply, and enjoy it. 

We would love to hear from or pray for you! If you have ideas, feedback, questions, or prayer requests, please let us know at https://christianmeditation.co/contact .

Published by Christian Meditation Media - https://christianmeditation.co
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
